editor.title: 聖遺物編輯器

error.noOverRoll: 副詞條不可超過 {{value}} 個

editor.curSubEffDesc: 聖遺物每升級 4 次，就會得到一次副詞條的追加提升。估值會計算單一副詞條的提升比例。
editor.maxSubEffDesc: 聖遺物的最高副詞條估值指計算持續提升副詞條至最高數值的估計值。
editor.upArt: 偵測到已升級的聖遺物
editor.clearPrompt: 目前編輯器裡有一個聖遺物。您確定要清除編輯器嗎？

artifact.buttonHint: 注意：紅色選項僅用於<1>篩選後的聖遺物</1>
tipsOfTheDay: 4 星聖遺物的最高估值為 60% 左右。
聖遺物的最高估值一般隨著你對它的升級而降低。這很正常！
含有「1」的副詞條較難通過截圖掃描識別。
如果你的 6 次副詞條升級，強化了同一個副詞條，它會呈現紫色！
點選「詳情」以了解如何添加在遊戲內升級後的聖遺物。
現在您可以上傳多張聖遺物截圖進行識別！

info.title: 聖遺物編輯／管理指南
info.section1: <0>副詞條升級次數</0><1> <1>副詞條升級次數</1>顯示在副詞條左側. 次數越多，副詞條顏色越深:<3></3>. </1><2>副詞條評分</2><3>副詞條評分指副詞條當前數值佔5<1></1>最高數值的比例. 如圖所示, 暴擊傷害最高升級值一次爲7.8%，在評分中： <3>5.8/7.8 = 69.2%.</3></3><4>當前評分 vs. 最高期望評分</4><5>當一個五<1></1>聖遺物經過 9 (4+5) 次總升級，且每次升級都是最大數值升級，此時被認爲是100%評分的聖遺物. 然而，大部分聖遺物沒有這麼幸運. 3>當前副詞條評分</3> 是該聖遺物與100%評分聖遺物相較的結果. <5>最高副詞條評分</5> 是一個聖遺物接下來的升級都獲得最高數值時，能獲得的評分. </5><6>鎖定聖遺物</6><7>通過鎖定聖遺物 <1></1>，該聖遺物不會被配裝生成器選入計算中. 同樣，已經被裝備的聖遺物是默認被排除的. </7>
info.section2: <0>聖遺物編輯器</0><1>支持任意3<1></1> 到 5<3></3>聖遺物的全功能編輯器. 輸入副詞條後，能自動計算升級次數並評分. 同時編輯器會確保你的升級次數與聖遺物等級匹配. </1><2>截圖掃描</2><3>如果你不想手動輸入聖遺物，可以通過截圖掃描的方式識別輸入聖遺物. 在聖遺物編輯器界面，點擊 <1>Show Me How!</1> 可見使用方法. </3><4>自動聖遺物掃描儀</4><5>如果你在PC上玩原神，你可以下載使用聖遺物掃描工具來爲你掃描所有的聖遺物，並導入GO的 <1></1> 數據庫內. <3>點此</3> 獲取與 GO 兼容的掃描器列表.</5><6>重複/升級後聖遺物檢測</6><7> GO可以檢測出你導入的<1>重複</1> 聖遺物哦！原先擁有的聖遺物<3>升級後</3> 也會被檢測出來. 一旦檢測到重複/升級的聖遺物，會出現預覽界面允許你比較這些聖遺物 (見圖片).</7>
info.section3: <0>聖遺物背包</0><1>這裡會顯示所有被加到 GO 的聖遺物。篩選器可以協助您更精簡地瀏覽目前擁有的聖遺物。</1><2>例如：尋找可消耗的聖遺物。</2><3>利用聖遺物篩選器及估值，您可以快速找到可以消耗的聖遺物。</3><4>在這個例子中，篩選器可以這樣設定：</4><5><0>限制聖遺物等級為 0-8 等。</0><1>背包內未鎖定的聖遺物。</1><2>固定生命值、固定防禦力及元素充能效率不納入估值計算當中。</2><3>依照最大估值進行升序排列。</3></0></5><6>這樣，聖遺物背包就能依照指定的詞條，由低到高篩出最低估值的聖遺物。</6>

tooltip.detectdup: Find upgrade/duplicates in the GO inventory and merge the import into GO.
tooltip.ignoreDup: Do not detect upgrades/duplicates, the import is added on top of existing GO inventory.
tooltip.delNotInImport: Assume the import to be the full inventory. Items in GO Inventory that doesn't exist in the import are deleted.
tooltip.keepNotInImport: Assume the import is a partial inventory. Nothing will be deleted.

page_home.intro: The ultimate <3>Genshin Impact calculator, GO will keep track of your artifact/weapon/character inventory, and help you create the best build based on how you play, with what you have.

scanners.tooltip: 自動掃描遊戲中聖遺物的第三方程式

patchNotes.title: 原神最佳化工具更新日誌

page_scanner.intro: <0>Scanners<1>Scanners are Genshin tools that can automatically scan game data from screenshots or directly from the game.<2>Below are several scanners that have been tested with GO.<3>To upload the exported file, go to <1>Settings page and upload your file in the Database Upload section.

ik.title: Inventory Kamera
ik.p1: This light-weight app will scan all the characters, weapons and artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instructions in the app to set it up.

am.title: 「天目」
am.p1: Scans all you artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instructions to capture the window and scan. Has both Chinese and English versions (download the <1>_EN.exe</1> version to scan in English). GO only accepts the <1>GOOD</1> format.

as.title: AdeptiScanner
as.p1: Scans all artifacts in your inventory. Has a manual scanning mode.
as.p2: This scanner can also be configured for new artifacts in new game versions without needing an update.

page_scanner.goodeng: This app only scans in English and exports to <1>GOOD</1> format.
page_scanner.tosWarn: As any tools that indirectly interact with the game, although their usage is virtually undetectable, <1>there could still be risk with using them.</1> User discretion is advised.

nb.title: Artiscan
nb.p1: 這個基於網頁的掃描工具能夠擷取到你的遊戲視窗，並從螢幕截圖或影片中掃描。
nb.p2: Mobile/PlayStation can only be scanned from screenshots or video.

ak.title: Akasha Scanner
ak.p1: Automatically scans artifacts as well as characters and weapons. Allows exporting of past scans as it keeps a history within the app. Scans only in English.
ak.p2: This app is also able to scan achievements for <1>Paimon.moe</1> and <1>Seelie.me</1>.

page_scanner.seelieme: This app can also scan materials for <1>Seelie.me</1>

page_character.removeCharacter: Are you sure you want to remove {{value}}?

multiTarget.title: Multi-Optimization Target Config
multiTarget.info1: Note: Community created custom Multi-Optimization Targets can be found within the <1>GO Discord</1> or <3>KQM Multi-Opt Guide</3>, however the validity of such configurations cannot be guaranteed.
multiTarget.info2: It is the responsibility of the user to confirm the accuracy for their own use case.

addStats.title: Enemy Config + Bonus Stats
addStats.info: You can use these fields to add buffs/debuffs not directly supported in GO, such as food buffs, abyss cards, or Superconduct. Please refer to the <1>Genshin Impact wiki</1> for specific values.

tabTheorycraft.maxTotalRolls: A "valid" build can only have a maximum of 45 rolls.
tabTheorycraft.maxRolls: This substat can have a maximum of 30 rolls.
tabTheorycraft.maxRollsMain: Because at least one mainstat has the same stat, this substat can have a maximum of {{value}} rolls.

tabTeambuff.resonance_tip: 隊伍中需要有 4 位角色才能觸發元素共鳴。

char_Dori.c4ConnectedBelowEner: Character connected to Jinni and below 50% Energy

SprawlingGreenery.cond3ele: After triggering Aggravate, Spread, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions

EnduringRock.hitCond: After dealing DMG to enemies while protected by a shield

levelAssTooltip.title: 主詞條等級強化
levelAssTooltip.desc: 改變主詞條等級到可提升副詞條的最低特定等級。不能改變副詞條。

assumptionLvl.no: 假設主詞條不提升等級
assumptionLvl.lvl: 假設主詞條至少為 {{lvl}} 級

tcGraph.desc: Using data from the builder, this will generate a graph to visualize Optimization Target vs. the selected Graph Target. The graph will show the maximum Optimization Target value per 0.01 of the selected Graph Target. Enabling this is optional, and doing so will slow down build times
tcGraph.buildAlreadyInList: Build is already in the list

constraintFilter.title: Minimum Build Constraints
constraintFilter.tooltip: Set certain minimum requirements that generated builds must conform to. e.g. Generated builds must have at least 140% Energy Recharge.

setCond.title: Artifact Set Conditional Effects
setCond.text: Some artifact set effects provide conditional stats. This window allows you to select those effects, so they can contribute stats when a build that satifies a set effect is calculated during optimization.

ArtSetFilter.title: Artifact Sets <1>Allowed<1></1></1> / <3>Excluded<1></1></3>
ArtSetFilter.intro: You can allow/exclude which sets you want the builder to consider. In the following examples, A is on-set, and R is rainbow(off-set)

page_character_optimize.buildDropdownDesc: Decreasing the number of generated build will decrease build calculation time for large number of builds.
page_character_optimize.threadDropdownDesc: Increasing the number of threads will speed up build time, but will use more CPU power.
page_character_optimize.noArtis: Oops! It looks like you haven't added any artifacts to GO yet! You should go to the <1>Artifacts</1> page and add some!
page_character_optimize.workerLoadFailed: Worker failed to load. Click here to reload the page and try again

excludeArt.title_tooltip: Add artifacts to this character's exclusion list. Artifacts in the exclusion list will not be considered for build generation.
excludeArt.addExc: Add artifact to this character's exclusion list
excludeArt.selExc: Select artifact to add to this character's exclusion list
excludeArt.deSelectExc: Click on an artifact to remove it from the exclusion list
excludeArt.excludeArtifactTip: Excluding an artifact will prevent the build generator from using it for this character.

excludeChar.title: Equipped Artifact Configuration

modal.allow_all: Add all shown characters to the allow list
modal.disallow_All: Remove all shown characters from the allow list

excludeChar.tooltip: Add characters to this character's allow list. Characters in the allow list will be considered for build generation. You can also toggle between using only unequipped artifacts, your custom allow list, and using all equipped and unequipped artifacts.

page_character_optimize.notifyTooltip: Play a sound when builds finish generating. Will also show an alarm prompt when tabbed out.

page_newTab.title: 🛑 偵測到新的 Optimizer 分頁 🛑
page_newTab.p1: 你似乎在其他分頁開啟了原神最佳化工具 💞。本工具沒有針對多分頁進行設計📵，這可能會導致：

symptom.1: 不同分頁的資料不會同步🙃。
symptom.3: 胃部不適🤰，並且讓原神最佳化工具的開發者們感到沮喪 😡。
symptom.4: 在極少數的情況下還會掛掉☠️。

page_newTab.p2: 我們透過這段訊息來阻止這些事情發生 📝，你有以下選擇：

choice.1: 關閉目前的分頁 🔪，然後在新分頁繼續使用🆕。
choice.2: 關閉新的分頁 ↩️，並確保目前的分頁是唯一的 GO 網頁 🔂，重新整理此分頁 🔄。

page_error.title: 🛑Unexpected Error Occurred🛑
page_error.p1.1: GO has experienced an unexpected error. This is probably our fault, so please help us help you!
page_error.p1.2: Here are some things you can try to resolve the issue:

fixes.2: Disable any extensions and refresh again
fixes.3: Download your DB(s) from below and keep it somewhere safe. Click the 'Delete ALL GO Data' button and reupload your DB(s)

page_error.p2: If you did the above and still managed to get back here, please submit a report to our GitHub Issues page, or to our Bug Reports channel on our Discord

report.2: Copy the report text from the box below
report.3: Click <1>here</1> to report on GitHub. Paste the text in the description, fill in the reproduction steps, and include your JSON files (you might need to rename them to end with '.txt')
report.4: Or click <1>here</1> to report on Discord. Open the #🐛bug-reports channel, create a new thread and paste the text in the message box. Fill in the reproduction steps and upload your JSON files.

page_error.caption: Live footage of our engineers investigating the problem
page_error.confirmNuke: Are you sure you want to delete ALL GO data? This is irreversible!
page_error.finishNuke: Wiped all GO data. Refreshing page.

editor.clearPrompt: 目前編輯器裡有一個聖遺物。您確定要清除編輯器嗎？

info.title: 聖遺物編輯／管理指南
info.section1: <0>副詞條升級次數</0><1> <1>副詞條升級次數</1>顯示在副詞條左側. 次數越多，副詞條顏色越深:<3></3>. </1><2>副詞條評分</2><3>副詞條評分指副詞條當前數值佔5<1></1>最高數值的比例. 如圖所示, 暴擊傷害最高升級值一次爲7.8%，在評分中： <3>5.8/7.8 = 69.2%.</3></3><4>當前評分 vs. 最高期望評分</4><5>當一個五<1></1>聖遺物經過 9 (4+5) 次總升級，且每次升級都是最大數值升級，此時被認爲是100%評分的聖遺物. 然而，大部分聖遺物沒有這麼幸運. 3>當前副詞條評分</3> 是該聖遺物與100%評分聖遺物相較的結果. <5>最高副詞條評分</5> 是一個聖遺物接下來的升級都獲得最高數值時，能獲得的評分. </5><6>鎖定聖遺物</6><7>通過鎖定聖遺物 <1></1>，該聖遺物不會被配裝生成器選入計算中. 同樣，已經被裝備的聖遺物是默認被排除的. </7>
info.section2: <0>聖遺物編輯器</0><1>支持任意3<1></1> 到 5<3></3>聖遺物的全功能編輯器. 輸入副詞條後，能自動計算升級次數並評分. 同時編輯器會確保你的升級次數與聖遺物等級匹配. </1><2>截圖掃描</2><3>如果你不想手動輸入聖遺物，可以通過截圖掃描的方式識別輸入聖遺物. 在聖遺物編輯器界面，點擊 <1>Show Me How!</1> 可見使用方法. </3><4>自動聖遺物掃描儀</4><5>如果你在PC上玩原神，你可以下載使用聖遺物掃描工具來爲你掃描所有的聖遺物，並導入GO的 <1></1> 數據庫內. <3>點此</3> 獲取與 GO 兼容的掃描器列表.</5><6>重複/升級後聖遺物檢測</6><7> GO可以檢測出你導入的<1>重複</1> 聖遺物哦！原先擁有的聖遺物<3>升級後</3> 也會被檢測出來. 一旦檢測到重複/升級的聖遺物，會出現預覽界面允許你比較這些聖遺物 (見圖片).</7>
info.section3: <0>聖遺物背包</0><1>這裡會顯示所有被加到 GO 的聖遺物。篩選器可以協助您更精簡地瀏覽目前擁有的聖遺物。</1><2>例如：尋找可消耗的聖遺物。</2><3>利用聖遺物篩選器及估值，您可以快速找到可以消耗的聖遺物。</3><4>在這個例子中，篩選器可以這樣設定：</4><5><0>限制聖遺物等級為 0-8 等。</0><1>背包內未鎖定的聖遺物。</1><2>固定生命值、固定防禦力及元素充能效率不納入估值計算當中。</2><3>依照最大估值進行升序排列。</3></0></5><6>這樣，聖遺物背包就能依照指定的詞條，由低到高篩出最低估值的聖遺物。</6>

efficiencyFilter.title: 用於估值計算的副詞條

buttonHint: 注意：紅色選項僅用於<1>篩選後的聖遺物</1>
tipsOfTheDay: 4 星聖遺物的最高估值為 60% 左右。
聖遺物的最高估值一般隨著你對它的升級而降低。這很正常！
含有「1」的副詞條較難通過截圖掃描識別。
如果你的 6 次副詞條升級，強化了同一個副詞條，它會呈現紫色！
點選「詳情」以了解如何添加在遊戲內升級後的聖遺物。
現在您可以上傳多張聖遺物截圖進行識別！
cantDeleteLock: Cannot delete artifact because it is locked
locationsTooltip: Disable "All Equipped Artifacts" to filter by specific characters

weapon_MailedFlower.condName: After hitting an opponent with an Elemental Skill or triggering an Elemental Reaction

char_Somnia.name: Somnia
char_Somnia.title: Creation of Simulated Cognition
char_Somnia.description: A combination of an array of concepts. She exists in a variety of states and phases. Is she even real?

normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, launching beads that deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro> from her Astral Abacus.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to charge and unleash a continuous stream of Electro beads, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to up to 4 targets every 0.3s
charged.2: Somnia gains resistance to interruption and is free to move while using her Charged Attack.

plunging.1: Fires Electro beads at the ground, dealing <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> upon impact.

description.0: Somnia condenses immense energy from her Astral Abacus to create an explosion that deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> and create a Self-Containing Sigil with undefinable contents above her head.
description.1: The Self-Containing Sigil grants her the Schrödinger Superposition effect.
description.4: DMG dealt by Somnia's Normal and Charged Attacks is increased based on her Elemental Mastery.
description.5: Schrödinger Superposition expires after Self-Containing Sigil's duration ends or when Somnia leaves the field.

description.0: Somnia summons a star-shaped Celestial Cyclone around her, unleashing a burst of <electro>Electro DMG</electro> as it expands. The field will linger and deal continuous <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> to enemies within every 1s.
description.1: While Celestial Cyclone is active, Somnia's Elemental Mastery will be increased multiplicatively.
description.2: Additionally, while Celestial Cyclone is active, Somnia gains Stellar Statistics. While in this state, Somnia can set her Astral Abacus to the Multiplication, Addition or Subtraction modes, each granting her attacks and Celestial Cyclone different buffs. Only one Abacus mode from Stellar Statistics may be active simulatenously.
5: Multiplication: Within Somnia's Celestial Cyclone, all Sword-, Claymore- and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Electro. Normal or Charged Attack hits within the field will trigger Star Sunder, a coordinated Electro blast that deals AoE Electro DMG based on Somnia's Elemental Mastery. Star Sunder can be triggered once every 1.5s.

Addition: Celestial Cyclone's AoE and DMG are increased. Upon hitting an enemy, Somnia's Normal and Charged attacks will trigger a Supernova that deals AoE Electro DMG based on her Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.75s.

Subtraction: Celestial Cyclone has its AoE and DMG reduced, but applies the "Less Than Three" effect to enemies within it. "Less Than Three" reduces enemy Elemental and Physical RES based on Somnia's Elemental Mastery. Additionally, Somnia's Normal and Charged Attacks deal increased DMG based on her Elemental Mastery.

description.0: Somnia's Charged Attacks consume 20% less Stamina and charge up 20% faster
For the duration of Celestial Cyclone, Somnia's Elemental Mastery increases by 5% for every hit dealt by Celestial Cyclone, Star Sunder and Supernova, up to a maximum of 25%.
At night (18:00 - 6:00), speeds up Genshin Optimizer build speed by 10%.
Somnia's Normal and Charged Attacks have a 25% chance to deal twice the DMG

When Somnia is under the Schrödinger Superposition effect, each Normal or Charged Attack hit will give Somnia a stack of Natural Number. When the amount of Natural Number stacks is prime, Somnia's next Normal or Charged Attack will receive twice the DMG increase from Schrödinger Superposition.
Increases the Level of Parallax Paws by 3.
When Somnia triggers an Electro reaction, 4 Elemental Energy is restored to herself and all nearby party members of Elements involved in the reaction.
description.1: This effect can trigger once every 4s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Cosmic Calculator by 3.

When Somnia's Charged Attack deals damage, her CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are increased by 3% and 5% respectively. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and stack up to 8 times. All Golden Ratio stacks are cleared 13s after the first stack was obtained.

char_Somnia.c1Key: Normal and Charged Att. DMG Mult.
char_Somnia.lessThan3Cond: Enemy is affected by "Less Than Three"
char_Somnia.c2Cond: Possesses a prime amount of Natural Number stacks

weapon_QuantumCatalyst.name: Quantum Cat-alyst
weapon_QuantumCatalyst.description: This advanced Catalyst weapon is infused with the mysterious power of Quantum Mechanics and bears the likeness of a curious cat, with glowing green eyes, a tail that flickers with Electro energy and the occasional spark arcing between the ears.

passiveDescription.0: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>18%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>6%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. Upon triggering an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, gain <cryo>10</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times and stacks have their duration counted independently.
passiveDescription.1: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>22.5%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>7.5%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. Upon triggering an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, gain <cryo>12</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times and stacks have their duration counted independently.
passiveDescription.2: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>27%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>9%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. Upon triggering an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, gain <cryo>14</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times and stacks have their duration counted independently.
passiveDescription.3: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>31.5%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>10.5%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. Upon triggering an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, gain <cryo>16</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times and stacks have their duration counted independently.
passiveDescription.4: Increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>36%</cryo>. Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo> of Elemental Mastery. Upon triggering an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, gain <cryo>18</cryo> Elemental Mastery for 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times and stacks have their duration counted independently.
